analysis.description:
EDEX.claimEDEX (/unique_chucks/29/0xf6268188a46f47551fcfe664f3665c25bf697f52.sol#430-437) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(mainWallet,balance) (/unique_chucks/29/0xf6268188a46f47551fcfe664f3665c25bf697f52.sol#436)

EDEX.decimals should be constant (/unique_chucks/29/0xf6268188a46f47551fcfe664f3665c25bf697f52.sol#120-122)
EDEX.maxSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/29/0xf6268188a46f47551fcfe664f3665c25bf697f52.sol#123-124)
EDEX.minInvestment should be constant (/unique_chucks/29/0xf6268188a46f47551fcfe664f3665c25bf697f52.sol#142-143)

Token.approve (/unique_chucks/29/0xf6268188a46f47551fcfe664f3665c25bf697f52.sol#52-53) should be declared external

EDEX.checkLiquidationValue (/unique_chucks/29/0xf6268188a46f47551fcfe664f3665c25bf697f52.sol#389-402) should be declared external
EDEX.fallback (/unique_chucks/29/0xf6268188a46f47551fcfe664f3665c25bf697f52.sol) should be declared external
